title: Internet Of Robotic Things Based Autonomous Mobile Robot for Intralogistic
description: As a member of the IIIEX competition team, I earned a silver medal for our project 'Internet of Robotic Things-Based Autonomous Mobile Robot for Intralogistics', demonstrating expertise in IoT integration, robotics, and smart warehouse automation.

title: Line Follower Robot
description: A Line Follower Robot is an autonomous robot designed to follow a line (typically black on a light surface or vice versa) using light or infrared sensors.
